song.englishname: Did You Feel The Mountains Tremble?

english.segment1: Did you feel the mountains tremble?. Did you hear the oceans roar?. When the people rose to sing of. Jesus Christ the risen one
english.segment2: Did you feel the people tremble?. Did you hear the singers roar?. When the lost began to sing of. Jesus Christ the risen one
english.segment3: And we can see that God you're moving. A mighty river through the nations. And young and old will turn to Jesus. Fling wide your heavenly gates. Prepare the way of the risen Lord
english.segment4: Open up the doors and let the music play. Let the streets resound with singing. Songs that bring your hope. Songs that bring your peace. Dancers who dance upon injustice
english.segment5: Did you feel the darkness tremble?. When all the saints join in one song. And all the streams flow as one river. To wash away our brokeness
english.segment6: And here we see that God you're moving. A time of Jubilee is coming. When young and old return to Jesus. Fling wide your heavenly gates. Prepare the way of the risen Lord.
